name: General Analysis
headline: Automated AI Safety and Red Teaming Tools
description: General Analysis provides a comprehensive suite of AI safety tools, including red-teaming frameworks, interpretability techniques, and more. As AI systems become increasingly capable, their deployment in high-stakes environments poses significant risks—financial, ethical, and otherwise—where errors can lead to substantial consequences. To address these challenges, we offer access to novel tools and methodologies designed to systematically find model failure-modes and enhance model robustness.

founders.name: Rez Havaei, Founder
founders.description: Rez is the Co-Founder and CEO @ General Analysis. Previously he worked at Jane Street as a trader, as well as NVIDIA and Cohere as an AI researcher. He also helped build an LLM evaluation platform and benchmark at vals.ai as the founding engineer.

raw_markdown='[![General Analysis Logo](https://generalanalysis.com/_next/image?url=%2Flogo_light.png&w=64&q=75)![General Analysis Logo](https://generalanalysis.com/logo.svg)General Analysis](https://generalanalysis.com/</>)
[Home](https://generalanalysis.com/</>)[Blog](https://generalanalysis.com/</blog>)
Backed by Y-Combinator
 _Stress testing enterprise AI models to find failure modes._
Deploying AI in enterprise environments requires ensuring their robustness and safety.This is especially crucial when models are exposed to inputs that deviate from their training distribution.As these models become increasingly sophisticated, the potential risks under out-of-distribution conditions amplify, especially in high-stakes environments.This underscores the critical need for systematic stress testing.We provide a repository of stress testing, jailbreaking, and red teaming methods—a knowledge base to understand and improve the performance and safety of AI models.

[![Launch YC: General Analysis: Finding Failure Modes for AI Models](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/Mey-general-analysis-finding-failure-modes-for-ai-models/upvote_embed.svg)](https://generalanalysis.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/Mey-general-analysis-finding-failure-modes-for-ai-models>)

generated_description:
**General Analysis: Company Overview**

Founded in 2024 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S24, **General Analysis** is a San Francisco-based startup with a sharp focus on enhancing AI safety through automation. With a compact team of just two, they are tackling significant challenges in the realm of artificial intelligence by offering a sophisticated suite of tools aimed primarily at red-teaming, stress testing, and model robustness.

### Mission 
General Analysis is on a mission to create **Automated AI Safety and Red Teaming Tools**. As AI deployments grow in complexity and reach, the risks associated with their use in critical areas also escalate. The company’s solutions are designed to systematically uncover failure modes in AI models and improve their reliability, especially when dealing with situations outside the expected input range—a crucial need in high-stakes environments.

### What They Offer
Their offerings include:
- **Stress Testing Frameworks**: Essential for ensuring AI models can withstand unusual inputs.
- **Red-Teaming Tools**: Methodologies to challenge AI frameworks to find weaknesses.
- **Interpretability Techniques**: Ensuring models are not only robust but understandable to users.

By consolidating various stress testing, jailbreaking methods, and red teaming resources, General Analysis provides a knowledge base that empowers enterprises to safeguard their AI systems effectively.

### Backing and Tags
The company is backed by Y Combinator, a significant endorsement in the startup world, signaling strong potential. General Analysis is situated at the intersection of several vital sectors: 
- **Artificial Intelligence**
- **SaaS (Software as a Service)**
- **Trust & Safety**
- **San Francisco Bay Area Innovation**

Jared Friedman, a prominent figure in the Y Combinator network, serves as their Group Partner, adding invaluable industry insight and mentorship.

### Conclusion
In a world where AI's impact is growing, General Analysis is carving out a niche of utmost importance: the safety and reliability of AI technologies. They are not just building tools; they are building trust in AI by systematically reducing its failure risks. For anyone looking to deep dive into AI safety, their website is a worthwhile stop: [General Analysis](https://generalanalysis.com).
